title: cuDNN RNN doesn't support multiple backwards
body_html:
It always deletes self._nested_output regardless of retain_variables

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
AttributeError                            Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-14-8a13d1ccf570> in <module>()
----> 1 loss.backward(tmp)

/data/mulga/trask/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/autograd/variable.py in backward(self, gradient, retain_variables)
    156                     'or with gradient w.r.t. the variable')
    157             gradient = self.data.new().resize_as_(self.data).fill_(1)
--> 158         self._execution_engine.run_backward((self,), (gradient,), retain_variables)
    159 
    160     def register_hook(self, hook):

/data/mulga/trask/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/autograd/function.py in backward(self, *gradients)
    206 
    207     def backward(self, *gradients):
--> 208         nested_gradients = _unflatten(gradients, self._nested_output)
    209         del self._nested_output
    210         result = self.backward_extended(*nested_gradients)
body_text:
It always deletes self._nested_output regardless of retain_variables

<ipython-input-14-8a13d1ccf570> in <module>()
----> 1 loss.backward(tmp)

    156                     'or with gradient w.r.t. the variable')

--> 158         self._execution_engine.run_backward((self,), (gradient,), retain_variables)

    209         del self._nested_output
    210         result = self.backward_extended(*nested_gradients)
body:
It always deletes `self._nested_output` regardless of `retain_variables`

```
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
AttributeError                            Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-14-8a13d1ccf570> in <module>()
----> 1 loss.backward(tmp)

/data/mulga/trask/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/autograd/variable.py in backward(self, gradient, retain_variables)
    156                     'or with gradient w.r.t. the variable')
    157             gradient = self.data.new().resize_as_(self.data).fill_(1)
--> 158         self._execution_engine.run_backward((self,), (gradient,), retain_variables)
    159 
    160     def register_hook(self, hook):

/data/mulga/trask/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/autograd/function.py in backward(self, *gradients)
    206 
    207     def backward(self, *gradients):
--> 208         nested_gradients = _unflatten(gradients, self._nested_output)
    209         del self._nested_output
    210         result = self.backward_extended(*nested_gradients)
```
